input_text:
Job Title: Prisma Cloud Engineer

Location: McLean, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Piper Companies is seeking a PRISMA CLOUD ENGINEER!

You’ll act as the technical partner, providing strategic guidance around complex systems to secure a digital environment. Interacting directly with the client, you’ll partner closely with client personnel to guide and suggest integrations to better serve their success. You enjoy implementation work, are proactive about resolving potential concerns, and operate well around strict best practices that enable our clients on their road to a more secure digital world.

You’re creative, innovative, and you love a challenge – learning how integrations might work better around new products and technologies.

Your Impact 

Communicate with the customer(s), sales teams, peers, engineering and support teams as appropriateUnderstand the customer environment, requirements, and security roadmap to implement the appropriate security solutionConfigure, implement, and maintain Security Operating PlatformOptimize and migrate policies and objects from the existing environment to our Next-Gen FirewallTest and validate the migration environmentCoordinate and execute cutover to productionProvide guidance on code upgradesFacilitate the development of new application and threat signaturesInteract with our Technical Assistance Center (TAC) to understand and diagnose support casesSome travel may be required, dependent on customer request

Your Experience

Solutions Architect experience (Dev Ops Engineering background)Must be very comfortable with presenting to Leadership and the customer and possess strong consulting skillsKnowledge of GCPPython Scripting (beginner experience at minimum) in addition to RQL preferably scripting in RedLock or Twistlock.Must have mid to advanced experience in Docker and KubernetesAutomation: CI/CD pipeline exposureBS in Computer Science, MIS, business, or equivalent education/training/experienceMinimum of 3 years’ experience leading security solutions in large environments)You effectively handle multiple projects and work calmly in high pressureYou're an excellent writer, with strong verbal communication skills, with demonstrable ability to communicate to senior leaders and technical peers

Compensation for the Prisma Cloud Engineer includes:

Salary: $140,000 - $170,000 Hourly: $60/hr.– $85/hr.Full benefits: Healthcare, Dental, Vision, 401k, Flexible work schedule

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.summary: Piper Companies seeks a PRISMA CLOUD ENGINEER to provide strategic guidance on complex systems for securing a digital environment.

required_skills: Excellent writer, strong verbal communication skills
soft_skills: Demonstrable ability to communicate to senior leaders and technical peers

Understand customer environment, requirements, and security roadmap
Configure, implement, and maintain Security Operating Platform
Optimize and migrate policies and objects
Coordinate and execute cutover to production
Facilitate development of new application and threat signatures
Interact with Technical Assistance Center (TAC) for support cases
Travel as required by customer request

benefits: Full benefits: Healthcare, Dental, Vision, 401k, Flexible work schedule
